mapper.select: SELECT r.requisition_id, r.requisition_code, r.requisition_status, r.created_member_id, r.approved_member_id, r.vendor_id, r.warehouse_id, r.product_count, r.total_quantity, r.total_price, r.reject_reason, r.due_date, r.created_at, r.submitted_at, r.modified_at FROM requisition r WHERE r.requisition_id = #{requisitionId} AND (r.created_member_id = #{memberId} OR r.approved_member_id = #{memberId})
SELECT rd.requisition_detail_id, rd.product_id, rd.contract_id, rd.quantity, rd.unit_price, rd.total_price FROM requisition_detail rd WHERE rd.requisition_id = #{requisitionId}
